title: American Symbols and Patriotism

vocab.definition: Something that stands for or represents something else
A piece of cloth with colors and designs that represents a country
Love for and loyalty to your country
Showing that you think something is important and valuable
A big figure made of stone or metal
A large bird that is a symbol of the United States
A symbol of American independence found in Philadelphia

teachingNotes: Show pictures of American symbols and discuss their meanings. Practice proper flag etiquette. Connect to classroom and school community respect.
